This is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity. The people have given us unified government. Now we must reach for that brighter horizon.
We are not here to be; we are here to do. As your Speaker, I intend to keep this place running at full speed.
I want to say to the American people: We hear you. We will do right by you. And we will deliver.

To all our new members, I want to say simply: Thank you, congratulations, and welcome.
